name: places/ChIJEdyEb6ZbwokRdb3guNN95G4
formattedAddress: 96 South St, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 96 South St, New York, NY 10038, USA

originalText.text:
Alright. Quite mediocre and was disappointed by how small the venue is. Very few people when I went and most of the things to do were photo shoots (the ski ball is not as fun as it looks like on social media and there is only 1).

The VIP ticket, $40+ at the time of the review, definitely isn't worth it. All you get is a very cheap Santa hat, a free cup of hot chocolate (with choice of cream and sprinkles), and access to a "VIP lounge bar," which is comfortable and warm, but drinks and food are ridiculously overpriced (as you'd expect). We were done looking at everything in just 30 minutes.

Though a cute place to stop by and check out if you have a date. Very cute/pretty decorations along with a great view. Just don't have too high expectations.

originalText.text: This place is a huge scam, fraud. There is absolutely nothing except you get to take few picture , there is no ice skating it’s a plastic floor! The hot chocolate is like drinking hot sweet water . Please save your money and stay away from this place. Honestly there is absolutely nothing here to do ! And you pay $35 per person to do what? Nothing .

originalText.text:
Santa Claus Winter Wonderland had some good points, like being a nice spot for Christmas pictures and offering tasty hot chocolate with the VIP ticket. The employees were friendly, and getting a picture with Santa added a festive touch. However, the excitement dwindled when we hit the rink – it was disappointingly fake and tiny, made of plastic instead of real ice. Trying to skate on it was a struggle, taking away from the enjoyment we anticipated.

The biggest letdown, though, was the value for money. We shelled out about $60 per person for VIP tickets, only to find ourselves spending a mere 30 minutes there, mostly dedicated to snapping pictures. The short-lived experience didn't match up with the hefty price tag, making it feel too expensive for what we got. ⭐️⭐️

originalText.text: Totally not worth the price. Parking is far, you can get access to the same view for free. Everything is fake including the ice for skating. Cabins are small. Don’t buy it. Then take a look at the receipt. They add 20% tip for a large group and then make it look like you need to tip more. Rip off.

originalText.text: the scenery is a good scenery, it gives the winter mood. they have small games that you could play together such as foosball. the food isn’t exactly really good such as the burgers and the hot chocolate. however the ice cream is pretty good. overall we don’t think its worth the price(s).
